title: THUS SPAKE ZARATHUSTRA. SECOND PART.
content:
“—and only when ye have all denied me, will I return unto you. 
 
 Verily, with other eyes, my brethren, shall I then seek my lost ones; with another love shall I then love you.”—ZARATHUSTRA, I., “The Bestowing Virtue.”

book.title: Thus Spake Zarathustra
book.description: 简介： Zarathustra is my brothers most personal work; it is the history of his most individual experiences, of his friendships, ideals, raptures, bitterest disappointments and sorrows. Above it all, however, there soars, transfiguring it, the image of his g...
